name: TriRecyclotronᵀᴹ
description:
[02-05-18]
The date on which I started messing around with the file that would end up into an envato item. 

[11-09-19]
This animation was made in the attempt to make it available as visual content for people that would every require this kind of logo for the promotion of eco-friendly, durable, recycling, repurposing, ect.. It hasn't sold more than twice. I hope, not to serve the purpose of what we call "green washing". So unfortunately I cannot , according to the laws of the offer and demand, ask a high starting price for this at this moment in time. 

It seems there is not a lot of commercial demand for these kind of purpose around on this planet, at this time. Unless you here we can prove otherwise? I will divide this TriRecyclotronᵀᴹ in many editions for it to spread as much as possible. And afterwards, let's work on raising the value we assign to the idea of a sustainable and clean future.
can we just, at least, not have our short term behavior patterns destroy everything???

https://videohive.net/item/recycle-symbol-pack/24600992
